name: CrunchMyNumbers
short_description:
CrunchMyNumbers is an Online Invoicing system written in PHP and using MySQL as the backend database. It was created for small business, freelancers and just about anybody else who needs to create invoices using the Internet!

It has been designed to be fast and very easy to operate.

You can also use CrunchMyNumbers:
        As a contact manager
        As a prospecting tool
        To create job proposals or quotations
        To create work orders
        To send company-wide messages
        To email promotions to customers or prospects
        & much more
